newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bundesbank poll-No rate cut seen this week.
newsitem.headline: Bundesbank poll-No rate cut seen this week.

text.p: Following are the results of a poll of 10 economists on the expected outcome of this week's Bundesbank council meeting. The poll was conducted on Tuesday.
1. Will the Bundesbank cut its leading interest rates this week?
Yes 0
No 10
2. Will there be a further cut in the discount and lombard rates later this year?
Yes 0
No 10
3. Will there be another fixed tender at 3.00 percent this Thursday?
Yes 10
No 0
Detailed results of the poll as follows:
Economist 1. 2. 3.
Gerhard Grebe, Bank Julius Baer, Ffm No. No. Yes.
Michael Lewis, DMG, London No. No. Yes.
Armin Kayser, SBC Warburg, Frankfurt No. No . Yes.
Stefan Bergheim, Kleinwort Benson, Ffm No. No. Yes.
Wilfried Bock, Norddt. Landesbank No. No. Yes.
Ulrich Beckmann, Deutsche Bank Res.,FfmNo. No. Yes.
Mortimer Lee, Banque Paribas, London No. No. Yes.
Thomas Mayer, Goldman Sachs, Frankfurt No. No. Yes
Timo Klein, MMS Int., Frankfurt No. No. Yes
Ros Lifton, HSBC Markets, London No. No. Yes.
--Frankfurt Newsroom, +49 69 756525
